title: Bug 21357[Viewers] TreeViewer(Composite parent,int style) javadoc error
description: The javadoc explains what stylebits are set, but it's obviously a copy'n'pasteerror:Creates a tree viewer on a newlycreated tree control under the given parent.The tree control is created using the given SWT style bits. The viewer has noinput, no content provider, a default label provider, no sorter, and no filters.The tree control has the MULTI, HSCROLL, VSCROLL and BORDER style bits set.
